help.admin_commands:
**ğŸ‘® Perintah Admin:**
/settings - Menu pengaturan
/warn [alasan] - Beri peringatan (reply)
/unwarn - Hapus peringatan (reply)
/kick [alasan] - Kick user (reply)
/ban [alasan] - Ban user (reply)
/unban - Unban user (reply)
/mute [durasi] - Mute user (reply)
/unmute - Unmute user (reply)
/stats - Statistik grup
help.user_commands:
**ğŸ“‹ Perintah Umum:**
/help - Bantuan ini
/rules - Aturan grup
/mystatus - Status Anda di grup
